name: Mingfu Shao
content: About PI | Shao Group Mingfu Shao Associate Professor Department of Computer Science and Engineering The Pennsylvania State University Brief Bio Mingfu Shao joined the Department of Computer Science and Engineering, The Pennsylvania State University as an assistant professor in July 2018 and promoted to Associate Professor in July 2024 (with tenure). Before that Mingfu was a Lane Fellow in the Computational Biology Department, Carnegie Mellon University, under the supervision of Prof. Carl Kingsford. Mingfu obtained his Ph.D. (Thesis: Models and Algorithms for Comparative Genomics) in July 2015 from the IC school, École Polytechnique Fédérale de Lausanne (EPFL), Switzerland (Advisor: Prof. Bernard M.E. Moret). Here is Mingfu’s CV. Affiliations Department of Computer Science and Engineering (home) School of Electrical and Engineering and Computer Science Computer Science Theory Research Group Center for Computational Biology and Bioinformatics Bioinformatics and Genomics Program Huck Institutes of the Life Sciences Contact Email: mxs2589@psu.edu Office: Westgate W205A
